summary.Title: BLACKSMITH AND BLACKSMITH APPRENTICE
summary.Presentation:
For our production, we are looking for committed employees who can be part of our production team.
Area of responsibility
You will be part of our team with 15-20

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
For our production, we are looking for committed employees who can be part of our production team.


Area of responsibility

You will be part of our team with 15-20 other blacksmiths. You will receive a thorough training which in the future will give you success in the job.

Dana Tank is a company that specializes in producing pressureless tanks and vessels for a big part of the industry.


Your main tasks will be:

  • Welding tanks and vessels

Qualifications and competencies

  • You are a blacksmith or dream of becoming a blacksmith
  • You are results-oriented
  • You thrive on challenging tasks
  • You manage to be a professional problem solver
  • You have a good mood and can cooperate
  • You are proud of your own work


We offer

  • Salary during illness
  • Pension
  • An exciting position
  • Good opportunities for personal and professional development
  • Flexibility and freedom under responsibility
  • Part of a larger group with contact across
  • An informal and collaborative work environment where we value well-being

Moving to Denmark

If you dream of moving to Denmark, there will be good opportunities for that. There will also be an opportunity to get help finding a job for your partner, as well as a home and school for the children.

Read more on the municipality's website: https://www.flytmodvest.dk/english

 

If you have any questions about the position, you are welcome to contact the Department Manager, Mogens Veggerby on +45 26 34 59 30

 

We look forward to hearing from you

If you want to apply for the position, please send your CV and your application as soon as possible to Frederikke Thomsen by email: hr@ipl.dk (Please write: "Blacksmih Dana Tank" in the subject field)

 

 

We process applications on an ongoing basis, and it is therefore an advantage that you apply as soon as possible. All inquiries are treated confidentially.




All inquiries are treated confidentially.
